channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Study shows Instacart may be charging some shoppers 20% more for the same product
item.description: The delivery app has claimed that price testing is part of a longstanding practice in retail sales.

item.title: DoorDash rolls out Zesty, an AI social app for discovering new restaurants
item.description: Users can view and share photos and comments about restaurants they’ve visited, discover content from others, and follow people just like on any socia...

item.title: Instagram brings Reels to the big screen, starting with Amazon Fire TV
item.description: By bringing Reels to TVs, Instagram can better compete with YouTube, which largely dominates the TV space.

item.title: Slate crosses 150,000 reservations despite waning EV truck enthusiasm
item.description: It took Slate Auto about seven months to grow its customer list by 50%, but new reservations appear to be outpacing any cancelations.

item.title: Meta’s AI glasses can now help you hear conversations better
item.description: Conversation focus uses the AI glasses' open-ear speakers to amplify the voice of the person you're talking to, says Meta.

item.title: Apple TV adds support for Google Cast even as Netflix ditches the feature
item.description: The tech giant's adoption of Google Cast signals its interest in making Apple TV a more competitive streaming service at a time when the market is see...

item.title: India’s Digantara raises $50M for space-based missile defence tech
item.description: With this funding, Digantara has raised $64.5 million in total.

item.title: X updates its terms, files countersuit to lay claim to the ‘Twitter’ trademark after newcomer’s challenge
item.description: X's new terms of service say that no one can use the Twitter name, trademarks, logos and more without written consent.

item.title: The Best Holiday Delivery Meal Kits (2025)
item.description: Christmas can be daunting. Meal kit boxes from Sunbasket and Blue Apron offer the satisfaction of making a home-cooked feast with a lot less stress.

item.title: Hacking group says it’s extorting Pornhub after stealing users’ viewing data
item.description: The Scattered Lapsus$ Hunters hacking collective stole Pornhub premium users’ data, including email addresses and viewing history.
